name: fider
description: Fider is an open-source feedback collection platform that allows users to submit ideas, vote, and comment. It is designed for product development teams and communities to gather and organize user feedback in a transparent way.

features.title: Feedback Collection
features.description: User idea submissions, Voting system, Comment threads. Transparent product development

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tag and categorize feedback. Structured insights

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Built for development workflows. Actionable feedback management

features.title: Status Tracking
features.description: Mark ideas as planned or completed. Clear communication

features.title: Moderation
features.description: Control submissions and comments. Quality management

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: SSO and OAuth support. Secure access

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Email updates on activity. Stay informed
